channel.title: Trailer Desync
channel.description: Just what it sounds like. The trailer on the home/splash page desyncs at about the point where the scientist gets caught by the tentacle-hand-thingy (don't know its real name, not a buff of the original HL). It's desyncing where the sound is behind the video. I'm not sure if it's just me, but if you need any specifics, just ask for them.

item.title: Trailer Desync
item.dc:creator: Parnifia
item.description:
Who knows? Now that we’ve established that there is, indeed, a problem, we aren’t the ones to deal with it.

…cough

Well, it seems to be working perfectly well on the BM Greenlight page. Congrats on that, by the way, assuming any of the devs ever read this.

[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]EDIT : Use the EDIT button next time instead of double post.

Read full topic

item.title: Trailer Desync
item.dc:creator: dinnsfire5
item.description:
I concur. Maybe they’ll just make a new one instead cough cough

Read full topic

item.title: Trailer Desync

item.description:
Parnifia:

Looks like someone needs to reupload it.

that’s a very small detail, there’s no need to reupload it

item.title: Trailer Desync

item.description:
sersoft:

youtube must’ve corrupted the video source file

Looks like someone needs to reupload it.

item.title: Trailer Desync
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
just tried it

yep lost sync at the headcrab jump in office complex and the magnum shots were noticeably out of sync, youtube must’ve corrupted the video source file

Read full topic

item.title: Trailer Desync
item.dc:creator: Parnifia
item.description:
Yes, YouTube gives the same problem. It leads me to believe that the problem may be with the video itself, and not the way computers are playing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Trailer Desync
item.dc:creator: Hyperbyte
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

I would suggest going to YouTube and see if it still gives you the same problem.

Out of curiousity: did you try to watch it to confirm if this happens to you too? Because for me the exact same thing happens on both the main page and YouTube directly. The sound stutters when the headcrabs attack, from there it’s out of sync.

Read full topic

item.title: Trailer Desync
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
The trailer on the main page is being pulled directly off of YouTube. Any problems you have with it should be common of any YouTube video you watch. I would suggest going to YouTube and see if it still gives you the same problem.

Read full topic
